results.title: Acute biventricular failure as a sequela of multiple autoimmune disorders.
results.text_hl: In this case, uncharacteristic clinical and laboratory findings led to an unanticipated diagnosis for a 24-year-old @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ admitted for new-onset @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@heart failure@@@ with features suggesting @<m>DISEASE_Cardiac_Tamponade</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002305 @@@cardiac tamponade@@@.

citations.NLM: Briasoulis A, Halpern D, Bhatti M, Dodell G, Herzog E. Acute biventricular failure as a sequela of multiple autoimmune disorders. Can J Cardiol. 2012 Sep-Oct;28(5):611.e7-9. PMID: 22542049
